name: @blockmason/link-sdk
description: Convenience library for accessing an API hosted on Blockmason Link.

scripts.build: rm -vfR lib; babel --only '**/index.js' --no-comments --compact true --minified --source-maps false --out-dir lib src; cp -vfR package.json yarn.lock README.md LICENSE.md lib/
scripts.documentation: rm -fR docs; (cd src; find . -type f -name index.js | xargs jsdoc --destination ../docs --package ../package.json --readme ../README.md)
scripts.test: find src -type f -name spec.js | xargs nyc --silent --check-coverage --lines 100 --per-file mocha --require @babel/register src/spec.setup.js
